thread.title: Pamela Anderson strips naked for magazine cover
thread.title_full: Pamela Anderson strips naked for magazine cover

author: Wires English | Indo-Asian News Service
title: Pamela Anderson strips naked for magazine cover
text:
Pamela Anderson strips naked for magazine cover By Indo-Asian News Service on October 1, 2015 at 4:41 AM Comments 
Los Angeles, Oct 1: It seems that age doesn’t irk Pamela Anderson one bit, as she stripped off for a hot new magazine shoot. At 48, the former “Baywatch” actress has become FHM magazine’s oldest cover star, reports mirror.co.uk. 
The mother-of-two has posed with just a duvet covering her modesty as she is seen running a hand through her short blonde hair in the hot cover shot. (ALSO READ: Pamela Anderson tags `Baywatch` remake as a bad idea) 
Another stylish black and white photo sees Anderson lying down on a bed, staring seductively away from camera. Speaking to the magazine about her wild past at the Playboy mansion, she revealed: “It was a very sexy time. It was all wild, but respectful. ”The men were elegant, and you wanted to badly get the most charismatic man to notice you. Girls were everywhere, giggling and laughing.”
